oracle.dss.gauge
Interface GaugeModel

All Superinterfaces:
Model
All Known Implementing Classes:
GaugeModelAdapter
public interface GaugeModel
extends Model

Methods that the gauge needs from a model. Most developers will use the BI Beans implementation of this interface.
